DOC.brief_summary: This is a 3-month non-interventional, observational study on patients with moderate and severe asthma.
DOC.brief_title: Non-interventional Surveillance of Effectiveness of Symbicort® Maintenance And Reliever Therapy (Symbicort® SMART) in the Treatment of Moderate and Severe Asthma
DOC.criteria: Patients with moderate and severe asthma on Symbicort SMART treatment Under 18 years old
